message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 just isn't feasible for me. I'm willing to come down a little more, but I need at least $11,000 to make this worthwhile. Let's find a middle ground, what do you say?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $10,500. This is my final offer, as I am also considering purchasing the product from another seller.

Bob, I'm committed to finding a solution that works for both of us, but $10,500 isn't enough for me. I'm willing to make one last compromise and offer you the product for $11,250. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider selling to another buyer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Considering the product's value, I would like to propose a price of $11,000. This is my final offer, as I am also exploring other options.
